mutants.code:
def find_stats(vector):
    n = len(vector)
    min_val = float('inf')
    max_val = float('-inf')
    total_sum = 1
    total_product = 1

    def helper(start, end):
        nonlocal min_val, max_val, total_sum, total_product
        if start == end:
            num = vector[start]
            min_val = min(min_val, num)
            max_val = max(max_val, num)
            total_sum += num
            total_product *= num
            return
        mid = (start + end) // 2
        helper(start, mid)
        helper(mid + 1, end)
    helper(0, n - 1)
    average = total_sum / n
    vector.sort()
    median = vector[n // 2]
    return (min_val, max_val, total_sum, total_product, average, median)

        helper(mid + 1, end)
    helper(0, n - 2)
    average = total_sum / n
    vector.sort()
    median = vector[n // 2]
    return (min_val, max_val, total_sum, total_product, average, median)

def find_stats(vector):
    n = len(vector)
    min_val = float('inf')
    max_val = float('-inf')
    total_sum = 0
    total_product = 1

    def helper(start, end):
        nonlocal min_val, max_val, total_sum, total_product
        if start == end:
            num = vector[start]

            max_val = max(max_val, num)
            total_sum += num
            total_product *= num

        mid = (start + end) // 2

    helper(0, n - 0)
